document.full_text: three-times major winner ernie els said on monday that he felt a mixture of pride and humility about joining an elite group at this week's players championship in ponte vedra beach, florida.
document.title: els set for special players tee-off as hall of famer
lines_and_colors: three-times major winner ernie els said on monday that he felt a mixture of pride and humility about joining an elite group at this week's players championship in ponte vedra beach, florida.
